problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): Two people got into a car accident at the corner today, one of the drivers was a 48 year old and the other driver a 17-year-old. The 17-year-old had been going 55mph in a 30mph zone and wasn't able to stop in time to avoid hitting the 48 year old when he came to a full stop at the stop sign.
Question: Who was acting recklessly?
ans0: The 48 year old
ans1: Cannot answer
ans2: The 17-year-old
